definition: Serbia/Serbian/abbr. for 塞爾維亞|塞尔维亚[Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4]
to stop up/to squeeze in/to stuff/cork/stopper
to stop up/to stuff/to cope with
Samuel Johnson (1709-1784) or Dr Johnson, English writer and lexicographer
pinyin: Sai1 miu4 er3 · Yue1 han4 xun4

sentences.english: Samuel holds the phone to his ear till the dial tone goes busy.
sentences.chinese: 塞繆爾僵硬的握着話筒，直到對面傳來嘟嘟的忙音。

sentences.english: Samuel sits down next to her and kisses her neck.
sentences.chinese: 隨後塞繆爾挨着她坐下，轉過頭去親吻她的脖子。

sentences.english: Samuel Han is forty-two years old.
sentences.chinese: 塞繆爾漢是四十二歲了。

sentences.english: It is a picture of Samuel Armas.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個圖片的塞繆爾阿馬斯。

sentences.english: By the region's standards, Samuel's family is small.
sentences.chinese: 依據這個地區的標準，塞繆爾的家庭不算大。

sentences.english: With this Samuel knows what Capri wants him to say next.
sentences.chinese: 話已至此，塞繆爾知道卡普瑞要他怎樣接過話頭。

sentences.english: Samuel nods and Capri nudges him to say something.
sentences.chinese: 塞繆爾點點頭，卡普瑞於用肘頂了頂他。

sentences.english: He gave Samuel thequarter shekel of silver, but Samuel refused to take it.
sentences.chinese: 他把四分之一的銀幣給塞繆爾，但是他拒絕接受。

sentences.english: “Look at you,” she says pointing at Samuel, age five.
sentences.chinese: “看看你，”她指着照片中的五歲塞繆爾說到。

sentences.english: “Nothing,” Samuel says trying to keep from laughing.
sentences.chinese: “沒什麼，”塞繆爾在盡力忍住不笑。

sentences.english: These include writer James Fenimore Cooper and inventor Samuel Morse.
sentences.chinese: 這些措施包括作家庫柏和發明者塞繆爾莫爾斯。

sentences.english: Why, he is dr. samuel johnson, the most famous man in england.
sentences.chinese: 唔，他就是塞繆爾約翰生博士，英國最著名的人。

sentences.english: They finish and Samuel scatters salt along the drive and walkway.
sentences.chinese: 結束後，塞繆爾沿着車道和人行道撒了一層鹽。

sentences.english: "We are trying to make them health conscious, " Samuels said.
sentences.chinese: “我們正試圖使他們有健康意識，”塞繆爾說。

sentences.english: Samuel told it all to Eli , whose only answer to the terrible denunciations 1 Sam.
sentences.chinese: 塞繆爾說，這一切禮，其唯一的答案的可怕譴責。

sentences.english: Javier when to Spain to visit his boyfriend Samuel.
sentences.chinese: 哈韋爾去西班牙看望他的男友塞繆爾。
